categorySection.ev_chargers_description: A wide selection of portable and wall-mounted chargers compatible with all EV types, offering flexible and reliable charging at home or on the go.
categorySection.ev_adapters_description: High-quality adapters that enable connections between different plug types and vehicles — perfect for ensuring charging compatibility anywhere.

items.title: How can I track my EV charger order?
items.text: Once your order ships, you will receive a tracking number by email. Use that number on our carrier’s site or in your account dashboard for real-time updates.

items.title: What is your return policy?
items.text: We offer a 30-day no-questions-asked return on all accessories. Contact support, ship the item back in original condition, and get a full refund.

items.title: Do you offer international shipping?
items.text: Yes! We ship to most countries. Shipping costs and delivery times vary—please see our Shipping & Delivery page for details.

items.title: How do I find the right adapter for my EV?
items.text: Each product page includes a compatibility chart. You can also use our Fitment Calculator by entering your vehicle make, model, and year.

items.title: What payment methods do you accept?
items.text: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay. For bulk or corporate orders, please contact sales@evstore.com.
